text: Östersunds BS is a bandy club in the town of Östersund in Sweden. It was established on 5 September 1974 when Ope IF's bandy section was disestablished. The women's bandy team debuted in the Swedish top division during the season of 2013-2014. == References == ==Other websites== *Östersunds BS Category:1974 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Östersund
title: Östersunds BS
